articles.content: Alfa Romeo may have only hung onto sixth in the Formula 1 constructors championship by the skin of its teeth after Aston Martin finished level on points, but the teams novel strategic approach, focus… [+7651 chars]

articles.author: Mike Bacon
articles.title: Former Ipswich, Liverpool and Everton striker David Johnson dies - East Anglian Daily Times
articles.description: David Johnson, the former Ipswich Town striker, who played for the club under Sir Bobby Robson, has died, aged 71.
articles.content:
David Johnson, the former Ipswich Town striker, who played for the club under Sir Bobby Robson, has died, aged 71.
Johnson joined Town in November 1972 from Everton, swapping for Ipswich's top goals… [+1686 chars]

articles.author: Andy Warren
articles.title: Andy's Angles: Ipswich Town exit Papa John's Trophy at hands of Pompey - East Anglian Daily Times
articles.description: Ipswich Town were knocked out of the Papa John's Trophy by Portsmouth last night. Andy Warren shares his thoughts on the game.
articles.content:
Ipswich Town were knocked out of the Papa John's Trophy by Portsmouth last night. Andy Warren shares his thoughts on the game.

Ipswich Towns run in the Papa Johns Trophy is over.
